General.Name: MCF Energy Ltd.
General.Description: MCF Energy Ltd. operates as an upstream oil and gas company in Europe. It engages in the identification, exploration, and development of proven and unproven oil and gas reserves. It holds interests in the Giant Welchau prospect located in Austria; and the Reudnitz gas development asset situated in Germany. The company was formerly known as Pinedale Energy Limited and changed its name to MCF Energy Ltd. in December 2022. MCF Energy Ltd. was founded in 2022 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
